data.actual_result: You can only visibly see the first portion (roughly 9 characters) before the rest is truncated. Right clicking does nothing, and hovering does not show a longer version. Note that if you double click the invite code and copy it, pasting it elsewhere will show the full code
data.expected_result: To see the full invite code
data.short_description: Server Invite Codes don't visibly expand in the new Server Settings if they don't fit
data.steps_to_repro: - Looks like the prerequisite is to have an "old format" invite code on your server (the long ones) - Open Server Settings - Go to User Management>Invites - Attempt to view the full invite code of one that is truncated (with an elipsis)
